entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.0°C

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
